mapper.sql: id, no, email, pwd, nickName, state, loginCount, loginTime, deleted, createTime, updateTime, createBy, updateBy, superAdmin
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tm_user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into tm_user (id, no, email, pwd, nickName, state, loginCount, loginTime, deleted, createTime, updateTime, createBy, updateBy, superAdmin) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logincount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{superadmin,jdbcType=INTEGER})

id,
no,
email,
pwd,
nickName,
state,
loginCount,
loginTime,
deleted,

mapper.update:
update tm_user
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
no = #{record.no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pwd = #{record.pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickName = #{record.nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{record.state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
loginCount = #{record.logincount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
loginTime = #{record.logintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deleted = #{record.deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createTime = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateTime = #{record.updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createBy = #{record.createby,jdbcType=INTEGER},
updateBy = #{record.updateby,jdbcType=INTEGER},
superAdmin = #{record.superadmin,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update tm_user set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, no = #{record.no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pwd = #{record.pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickName = #{record.nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{record.state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, loginCount = #{record.logincount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, loginTime = #{record.logintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{record.deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{record.updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createBy = #{record.createby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updateBy = #{record.updateby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, superAdmin = #{record.superadmin,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tm_user
no = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickName = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
loginCount = #{logincount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
loginTime = #{logintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createBy = #{createby,jdbcType=INTEGER},
updateBy = #{updateby,jdbcType=INTEGER},
superAdmin = #{superadmin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tm_user set no = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickName = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, loginCount = #{logincount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, loginTime = #{logintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createBy = #{createby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updateBy = #{updateby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, superAdmin = #{superadmin,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select DISTINCT x.id as id, x.parentId as pId, x.name as name, case x.url when '' THEN 'true' else 'false' end as isParent, x.url as menuUrl from sys_menu x where 1=1
and EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys_role_rel b where b.objId= x.id and b.relType=0 and EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys_role_rel r WHERE r.roleId = b.roleId AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sys_role_rel u WHERE u.roleId = r.roleId AND u.objId = #{userId} and u.reltype=1 ) ))
and x.parentId=#{parentId}
and x.rank =1
